name: Doppelganger (lost.directory)
description:
Submission for Weekly Game Jam - Week 102

Doppelganger is a fast-paced top-down shooter with a small twist.

[WASD] to move, hold [LSHIFT] for more precise movement.

Use your mouse to aim and [LEFT MOUSE] to shoot.

Buffs will enhance your abilities against your... doppelganger? 

(Using buffs will increase either your offensive abilities, speed, or raw health. However, doing so will also give your opponent a similar boost, perhaps even stronger...)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

First time participating in a Game Jam! 

And actually creating a somewhat complete game on top of that!

Greatly appreciate feedback of all sorts!
